body.p: I hereby certify that on the (16) Sixteenth day of January 1865 being the day I was to appear at Court in Louisville -- My wife was so ill that I could not leave her --
Eminence Ky April 17 1865 Thos B. Williams
I certify that the above statement made by T B Williams is correct
Subscribed & sworn to before me by T. B. Williams & W P Thorn this 17th day of April 1865
N W Gould N. P. H. C.
I am personally acquainted W P Thorn one of the affiants herein and know him to be a gentleman of veracity and give full faith and credence to the statement made by him above

I N Webb
Rep. Henry County
